ConfigItem.Name: API::Operation::V1::TicketSearch###SearchLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Maximum number of tickets to be displayed in the result of this operation.

ConfigItem.Name: API::Operation::V1::TicketSearch###SortBy::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default ticket attribute for ticket sorting of the ticket search result of this operation.

ConfigItem.Name: API::Operation::V1::TicketSearch###Order::Default
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default ticket order in the ticket search result of the this operation. Up: oldest on top. Down: latest on top.
